Class Inventory<T>

java.lang.Object
characters.inventory.Inventory<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of items stored in the inventory
public class Inventory<T> extends Object
Represents an inventory that holds items up to a specified capacity.

      public boolean removeItem(T item)
      Removes the specified item from the inventory if it exists.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the item was found and removed, false otherwise
